â€œYellow/Golden bud with Green and Dark Green scattered throughout. This bud is covered all over with brownish-orange hairs and tastes very earthy. â€œI added this concentrate as a little boost to my bowl when I vaped while working all day. Initially the high is great. clear head, productive and focused.
